page.title: 08LIFE STYLES - EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
As 41% of our residents live in 'tied' accommodation, employment is in the majority of cases in connexion with farming, forestry or other estate work.
The percentage of retired residents is in the region of 15, and a similar percentage of homes is unoccupied.
Employment in the immediate area is limited to land occupations, though 30% of our residents commute up to 17 miles to places of work.
The unemployment level may statistically appear low, but this is distorted by the fact that many farming families sustain younger members on farm staff, where in reality the farms may not be large enough to do this economically.
